sentences.en: Airliners are not meant to glide, although occasionally they have to.
sentences.cn: 客机通常不滑翔, 虽然有时候不得不这么做.

sentences.en: Begin your descend now to maintain a 2.40 degrees glide path.
sentences.cn: 保持2.40度下滑角,现在开始下降.

sentences.en: Chances are the pilot was not getting dependable glide slope data.
sentences.cn: 飞行员错过了设定可靠的下滑道数据的大好机会.

sentences.en: In the engine, he watched the trees glide by.
sentences.cn: 在火车头里, 他望着树木往后驰去.

sentences.en: Instead of saying'Excuse me ', he prefers to glide by side.
sentences.cn: 他懒得跟人家说 “ 借个光”而宁愿从一侧绕过去.

sentences.en: Joe let himself glide to earth.
Large sea birds, such as the wandering albatross, glide over the sea.
sentences.cn: 大的海鸟, 如漂泊信天翁, 在海洋上空滑翔.

sentences.en: So graceful was the ballerina that she just seemed to glide.
sentences.cn: 那芭蕾舞女演员翩跹起舞,宛如滑翔.

sentences.en: the graceful glide of a skater
sentences.cn: 滑冰者优美的滑行动作

sentences.en: The pilot managed to glide down to a safe landing.
sentences.cn: 驾驶员设法使飞机滑行下降安全着陆.

sentences.en: The shuttle itself will glide back into the earth's atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 航天飞机本身将滑回地球的大气层.

sentences.en: Waiters glide between tightly packed tables bearing trays of pasta.
sentences.cn: 侍者们端着一盘盘意大利面在拥挤的餐桌之间自如穿行。

sentences.en: We stood in silence watching the snake glide effortlessly.
sentences.cn: 我们噤若寒蝉地站着,眼看那条蛇逍遥自在地游来游去.

sentences.en: You are well above ( below ) the glide path, adjust rate of descent.
sentences.cn: 高 ( 低 ) 于下滑道太多, 调整下滑率.

sentences.en: You are well above the glide path, are you overshooting, over.
sentences.cn: 高于下滑道太多, 你复飞吗?回答.

sentences.en: You can relax and watch the magnificent landscapes glide by.
sentences.cn: 你可以悠然自得,观赏眼前掠过的美景.

words.tran_cn: [航] 滑翔机；滑翔员；滑翔导弹
滑翔；滑行；悄悄地走；消逝

trans.tran_cn: 滑行，滑翔，[乐]滑音，延音，流逝，消逝，静悄悄的流水
trans.tran_en: a smooth quiet movement that seems to take no effort
to move smoothly and quietly, as if without effort
to move smoothly and quietly, as if without effort
to move smoothly and quietly, as if without effort

trans.tran_cn: （鸟或飞机）滑翔，滑动，掠过，悄悄地走，消逝
